title: The Week of Wonders with Alice Bailey

story.text: In the quiet town of Evergreen, Alice Bailey starts her week attending the morning service at her local church. After service, she notices a strange, shimmering light in the church garden. Investigating, she discovers a glowing amulet that grants her the power to heal others.
Alice tests her new abilities by visiting the town hospital. With a simple touch, she miraculously cures patients of their ailments, garnering the attention of the local media.
News of Alice's powers spreads, and people from neighboring towns flock to Evergreen. Alice spends the day in the town square, healing all who come to her, though it starts to drain her energy.
Sensing the toll her powers are taking, Alice decides to spend a day in quiet reflection and prayer, seeking guidance on how best to use her newfound abilities.
A mysterious figure appears in Alice's dreams, warning her of an upcoming disaster. She wakes up determined to prepare and protect her community.

Alice uses her promotional skills to organize the town, setting up emergency services and shelters. As predicted, a storm hits Evergreen, but the town is ready and withstands the disaster with minimal damage.

After a week of heroic deeds, Alice speaks at her church, sharing her experiences and encouraging her community to always be prepared for the unexpected. Her selflessness has earned her the affectionate nickname 'Guardian Angel of Evergreen'.

ending: As the sun sets, Evergreen remains safe, its people united and uplifted thanks to Alice Bailey.
moral: Compassion and readiness can turn an ordinary individual into a hero.
